occult_treasures.name: Ash-Grey Ring
occult_treasures.desc: a finger-width wide. All that passes through is obliterated.

occult_treasures.name: Vile Flute
occult_treasures.desc: The keening music of this small, Vile Flute, animates a fetus-sized meat golem in a nearby corpse.

occult_treasures.name: Famine Spoon
occult_treasures.desc: A note explains: one taste from this spoon means death from slow starvation.

occult_treasures.name: Mirror
occult_treasures.desc: The image of a being in this malevolently-accurate mirror shows only the shameful truth of their soul.

occult_treasures.name: Vampiric Phurba
occult_treasures.desc: Heals you as it harms your target (d3), but beware: after stealing a total of 6 HP, test Presence DR12 daily.Fail and you must stab someone with the knife before next sunrise. Or wither to ash and die as the sun rises.

occult_treasures.name: Pearl
occult_treasures.desc: A black pearl. If dropped in darkness it rolls towards the nearest exit to day.

occult_treasures.name: Torch
occult_treasures.desc: This torch burns for an immortal hour. Hold it and live. You can lose limbs and enter negative HP but won't die unless you drop the torch or it burns out.

occult_treasures.name: Bird Cage
occult_treasures.desc: Silver Bird Cage slays whatever is placed behind its bars, slowly, over one long night. That which is killed reanimates twice as strong, as a raging uncontrollable undead.

occult_treasures.name: Black Crown of The Crippled King
occult_treasures.desc: Wearing this crooks your body as you become aware that you and every creature within 100 yards gain +10 to attack rolls but -10 to defence rolls. Rolls that go above 20 count as crits and below 1 as fumbles. The worn crown can only be removed in the pale light of a full moon.

occult_treasures.name: Blinfold
occult_treasures.desc: Anyone wearing this ancient Blindfold becomes invisible to those who breathe though the undead attack them obsessively and nearby corpses awaken in moaning, unholy wrath.

traps_and_devilry: Bells and marbles on the floor
Fish hooks hanging at eye level
Lock trapped with vial of poison gas
Jewel removal leads to roof collapse
Coins coated in grime and poison
